title: Senior Digital Merchandiser
content:
Drive JD Sports Digital offering forward, ensuring that stock availability is maximised and the site is visually merchandised with content, navigation and user experience appropriate to the customer. Deputising for the Merchandising Manager with a good knowledge of Merchandising Manager responsibilities.
 
 
Planning
 

Be aware of the Buying and Retail marketing activity and assist in creating trading plans to drive online marketing activity to reflect the strategy.

 
Trading
 

Create the weekly trading summary and daily progress updates
Review previous weekâ€™s performance and propose and agree actions for the week
Review daily sales identifying areas of weakness, proposing and taking action to increase sales and ensuring optimal stock availability
Monitor live sales to identify fast sellers on the day and act as required to maximise sales
Identify underperforming lines and categories and propose actions to improve sell through
Check all stock in the DC is available on all channels and take actions as required
Propose stories and products to be promoted on the site and through social channels
Review product attributes to ensure that site navigation, filters and collections are optimised
Continually review merchandising of site searches, navigation and listings and proposing actions when required to maximise sales
Review the new in list ensuring the site is representative of key products
Check all marketing spots are being utilised to maximise sales whilst staying consistent with the store activity to maintain the brand identity
Review top on site searches, action Fred Hopper rules to improve results and conversion
Review store sales to identify opportunities for
Work closely with the wider teams from Buying & Merchandising and Digital

 
 
Teamwork

Reports to the Digital Merchandising Manager
Line manage junior members of the team
Establish working relationships with divisional Buying & Merchandise teams, Digital and Marketing teams.
Trains and develops Digital merchandising team members

 
Key Deliverables
 

Assist the wider Digital teams to drive the marketing channels and deliver agreed sales targets.
Apply best practice
Build strong relationships with B&M team
Identify opportunities
Identify threats, and look to resolve
Become expert in the use of online systems/tools: Fredhopper and Google Analytics

 
Skills needed
 

Excellent knowledge of excel
Experience working with merchandiser software
Strong organisation and time-management skills
Commercial brand awareness
Keen eye for detail

 
The Company:
The JD Group is a leading omnichannel retailer of Sports Fashion, Street & Premium Fashion, Outdoors and Gyms with over 60,000 colleagues over 3,400 stores across several retail fascia's in over 30 markets around the world.
We are an equal opportunities employer who embraces and values differences. We recognise the importance of an inclusive workplace culture in which everyone can thrive irrespective of their background or identity.
To be a part of this successful and continuously growing company, you will have the desire to ingrain our strategic goals of being a people first, a digital leader and customer focused organisation which provides operational excellence and is continuous with identifying new areas of growth into our day-to-day.
We know our employees work tirelessly to make JD Sports the success it is today and in turn, we offer them some amazing benefits:

Incremental Holiday Allowance
Staff Discount on qualifying purchases across Group retail stores and online
Exclusive Colleague Bike Discount scheme
Discounted Gym membership
Personal development opportunities to learn and develop at work
Access to Apprenticeships and accredited qualifications

Interested? 
If you are interested in this position, then press the Apply Now button.
Due to the high volumes of applications our opportunities attract, it takes time to review them all. If you don't hear back within two weeks of your application, please consider your application to have been unsuccessful on this occasion
Applications that meet the skills criteria will be contacted for a 1st stage meeting with the talent team. Shortlisted candidates will then be invited to interview with the hiring manager.
Thank you again for your time.
